description:
Tamagawa Mari is a character created specifically for the Moshidora anime version to promote the single http://anidb.net/co3824 [If] by http://anidb.net/cr423 [Nakajima Megumi], who also serves as the voice for her personna. The single`s http://anidb.net/s43679 [titular song] is used as insert during the episodes 6 and 7 of the anime.
Tamagawa is an 18-year old popular idol from Hino, Tokyo. Asano, the team`s pitcher, is a big fan of hers and is seen listening to her radio show.
She does not make a formal appearance during the anime and only her voice is heard when she hosts her own radio show in episode 7. Furthermore, during episode 3 a poster, which is the cover of her single, is briefly shown.
name: Tamagawa Mari
